attributes.action: All current MPs to be deselected & not allowed to stand for re-election.
attributes.additional_details:
Every current sitting MP should not be allowed to stand for re-election at the next General Election given their disgraceful behaviour during the Brexit debate.

They have put personal interest before the interests of the electorate in the worst example of political behaviour in the history of this  great country
attributes.background: The current Brexit discussions have demonstrated that no current MP is capable of making a decision. They are not worthy of representing the people of this country

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.

You might like to sign and share this petition instead. 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/249457
